root: ^I used to have a lot of cool books here.
^But I had to get rid of them to make space.
^Sadly it's just drafts of tweets I made.
^W-well, I dev blogged my progress on this portfolio site on Twitter.
^Oh, more practical and less embarrassing than I thought.
^So... do you want to see the Twitter thread?
^Sure. Open it up in a new browser tab if you were to be so kind.
